text: Myctophiformes is a small order of ray-finned fish. The order consists of two families, the lanternfishes (Myctophidae) and the blackchins or neoscopelids (Neoscopelidae). == Families == * Myctophidae – lanternfishes * Neoscopelidae – blackchins == Extinct genera == * Eokrefftia * Eomyctophum * Neocassandra * Sardinius * Sardinioides == References == # FishBase (2006): Order Myctophiformes. Version of 2006-OCT-09. Retrieved 2009-SEP-28. Category:Ray- finned fish
title: Myctophiformes
